name: sloth
notes:
this no-sew crochet sloth pattern is quick, easy and cute!

this small sloth plushie has all of the cuteness and none of the sewing. it's a fun size for keychains and would make a great addition to your next market/craft fair or a fun gift.

the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy.

the free written pattern can be found [here][1] on my blog.

materials:

* super bulky yarn
* 4.5mm crochet hook
* 8mm safety eyes
* 4 ply yarn in black  or black embroidery floss
* polyester fiberfill
* fabric glue
* stitch marker, yarn needle, scissors
